instruct_text: Welcome to the Job Simulator Task!
In this task, you’ll first be introduced to the perspectives of 8 different jobs.
You’ll then learn 4 questions associated with each perspective.
Subsequently, you will be asked to apply those perspectives and questions to 8 stories.
For each story you read, you will be asked to assume one of the perspectives.
While reading, try to remember the perspective and the questions of that perspective.
